dailyFortune.title: Daily Fortune
dailyFortune.subtitle: Your daily dose of inspiration and cosmic wisdom

overview.title: About Daily Fortune
overview.description: Daily Fortune is a delightful mobile application that brings a touch of cosmic magic to your routine. Each day, receive a personalized fortune to brighten your day.
overview.motivation: Whether you're looking for a morning boost, a phrase to keep you on track, or a message to share, Daily Fortune fits into your routine to spread positivity and clarity.

items.daily: New cosmic fortunes delivered every day
items.motivation: A chosen message to brighten your day: fortune cookie, motivational quote, or positive affirmation
items.modern: Clean, responsive interface with smooth animations
items.cosmic: Space-inspired design that captures the wonder of the universe

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with modern web technologies to deliver a fast, beautiful, and reliable experience:

stack.nextjs: Next.js - React framework for production-ready applications
stack.tailwind: Tailwind CSS - Utility-first styling for cosmic aesthetics
stack.native: React Native - Native mobile experience for iOS and Android

ai.title: Powered by AI
ai.description: Daily Fortune leverages modern AI capabilities to generate unique, engaging, and contextually relevant fortunes that resonate with everyone's daily experiences and aspirations.

cta.title: Explore Daily Fortune
cta.description: Discover your cosmic fortune soon and let the stars guide your journey.
cta.ariaLabel: Download Daily Fortune (opens in a new tab)

mcomperat.title: mcomper.at
mcomperat.subtitle: Modern, responsive web CV of Matthieu Compérat

overview.title: About the Project
overview.description: Modern and responsive web CV of Matthieu Compérat, designed with Next.js (App Router) for fast, accessible, and SEO-friendly pages.
overview.architecture: Clear and maintainable architecture: reusable components, Server Components by default, and strict types for production reliability. Integrated internationalization in French (default) and English, with homepage redirection to /fr.

items.i18n: Internationalization: /fr and /en routes with dedicated JSON content
items.seo: SEO: metadata managed via Next.js API (generateMetadata) for better ranking
items.performance: Performance: Server Components, streaming, and React 19 for fast loading
items.accessibility: Accessibility: best practices (jsx-a11y) and semantic HTML
items.quality: Code quality: ESLint (flat config), Prettier (Tailwind sort), Husky hooks, sorted imports, zero lint errors

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with cutting-edge web technologies for a fast, maintainable, and production-ready experience:

stack.typescript: TypeScript 5.9+ (strict mode) - Type safety and reliability
stack.tailwind: Tailwind CSS 4.1+ - Utility-first styling with custom theme

ai.title: Powered by AI
ai.description: Development workflow enhanced by AI assistance for faster, more consistent, and higher quality results:

features.development: Assisted development: recommended use of GitHub Copilot to accelerate component writing and reduce errors
features.quality: Quality and consistency: automatic suggestions for import fixes, ESLint/TypeScript compliance, and Tailwind class ordering
features.content: Content and SEO: assistance with microcopy, meta/OG tags, and accessible alt text
features.i18n: Internationalization: help pre-generating consistent FR/EN strings from templates, with mandatory human review

cta.title: Explore mcomper.at
cta.description: Discover Matthieu Compérat's professional web CV and explore his expertise.
cta.ariaLabel: Visit mcomper.at website (opens in a new tab)

choeurDesPaysduMontBlanc.title: Chœur des Pays du Mont Blanc
choeurDesPaysduMontBlanc.subtitle: Website for the amateur choir based in Haute-Savoie, France

overview.title: About the Project
overview.description: The Chœur des Pays du Mont Blanc website is a modern web platform designed to showcase the choir's activities, upcoming concerts, and provide information to members and the public.
overview.mission: This website serves as a primary communication hub for choir members and music enthusiasts in the Mont Blanc region, facilitating event organization and community engagement.

items.concerts: Concert schedule with dates, locations, and program details
items.repertoire: Diverse repertoire from baroque to contemporary classical music
items.community: Member recruitment information and rehearsal schedules
items.events: Event updates and news about choir activities

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with modern web technologies to deliver an elegant and responsive experience:

stack.nextjs: Next.js - React framework for fast, SEO-friendly pages
stack.tailwind: Tailwind CSS - Modern styling for elegant presentation
stack.responsive: Responsive design - Optimized for all devices

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: This website is primarily designed to present the Chœur des Pays du Mont Blanc project to choir members, music enthusiasts, and the general public. It provides essential information about concerts, rehearsals, and opportunities to join this passionate musical community in the Haute-Savoie region.

cta.title: Discover the Choir
cta.description: Visit the website to learn more about upcoming concerts and join the musical journey.
cta.ariaLabel: Visit Chœur des Pays du Mont Blanc website (opens in a new tab)
